name: Ascending Adventurers!
description:
Hello! This is a new game that I have made. Nothing really that I wanted to say about the game, but if you are having trouble downloading the game, or opening it, I have the solution.

STEP 1: First download the .zip file that i had uploaded.

STEP 2: Then double click the .exe file.

STEP 3: Enjoy!

STEP 4: When you're done playing or you want to quit the game, just press Alt + f4 on your keyboard.
